availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Byron G. Wright (Mooresville, Indiana/ Trimble Co KY farmer)

body.p: Mooresville, Indiana, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Miranda Cook Wright in Henderson, Kentucky, on October 26, 1855. Father of Sallie E. Wright, Myatilla Wright, Charles W. Wright, and George W. Wright. Farmer in Mooresville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, Mooresville, p. 12.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #001944390, p. 9.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Bedford District, p. 41.
